attributes.action: control  the decibel level of domestic garden equipment such as leaf blowers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the summer months the din from gardeners using leaf blowers rises to a relentless high pitched roar. The users wear industrial ear-defenders  but neighbours are unprotected. Since the same job can be done using a rake, a mandate is sought to restrict the use of these immensely loud and deperately anti-social gadgets from which people prone to cluster-headaches suffer annually for months on end. Please help.
